name: Tower Defence (Spartan X36)
description:
A simple tower defence game where the enemies come for you rather than follow a defined path.

I started this following a tutorial and I thought I would just release it here just so I could get the ball rolling with actually completing a game. 

I used this as a chance to try making models and messing around with systems I had never touched before, it is not a fantastic game but I am happy I managed to finish it.
